alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:17PM CDT until May 08 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Poteau affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, extensive flooding of crop and pasturelands occur between Shady Point and Arkoma. Many roads in the floodplain become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 28.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
